posts.post_content:
- Will pay at least $1,000 for an autographed T206 card of a common player/pose that I have not listed below.  

- Will pay at least $2,000 for an autographed T206 card of a HOFer player/pose that I have not listed below. 

- Will pay $250 finder's fee (reward) for a connection with the owner of a signed T206 of a player pose that I have not listed below, if that connection ultimately sells/trades me that card.

- BONUS DOLLARS if you can help me find the current owner of these cards from the Morey collection (sold in the May 2001 Mastro auction - [url]http://www.legendaryauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=14752)?[/url]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/mVe-okLvbshdKCRg0gg0cj-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh6.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1TiLrgI8I/AAAAAAAAHK4/hjvS_HiqTsw/s800/T206%20Blackburne.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/quWDp3ZkFXhEwpLcRMonNj-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1TprnAjiI/AAAAAAAAHLA/72xJ2NO0iMc/s800/T206%20Cravath.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/YTFvdbedBVV6LhxVUJtk6j-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh3.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1Tpkw_ThI/AAAAAAAAHLE/LWnYNOosin4/s800/T206%20Lobert.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/07MTXyF5YA5tWxf6rJmHOT-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1Tp53vumI/AAAAAAAAHLI/8LQ8p7B0A44/s800/T206%20Rucker.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/gm1H9ymqf7dCCC4KBssyOD-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1TqMsiFqI/AAAAAAAAHLQ/5tDKdj6-Pag/s800/T206%20Zimmermann.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/FycuY3eHzg2ZPBoZ4Nr_uj-dJ5xd4dJClWvtWMdSiOc?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/So1TqEViduI/AAAAAAAAHLM/ecfmuCsGc9g/s800/T206%20Wiltse.JPG[/IMG][/URL]


- Card must be authentic & autograph must pass muster with JSA and/or PSA/DNA.  

- Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you've got anything to share.

Signed T206 Cards That Are Not Subject To This Reward:
HOFers

Fred Clarke (Batting)
"Wahoo" Sam Crawford (Batting & Throwing)
Elmer Flick
Walter Johnson (Pitching)
"Rube" Marquard (Portrait, Hands at Sides & Throwing)
Zack Wheat
Cy Young (Portrait)
 
COMMONS

Jap Barbeau
Bill Carrigan
Larry Doyle (Batting, Throwing & Portrait)
Davy Jones
Tommy Leach (Portrait & Bending Over)
"Lefty" Leifield (Batting & Pitching)
George McBride
"Chief" Meyers (Catching, Portrait & Batting)
Fred Parent
Fred Snodgrass (Catching & Batting)
Jack Warhop
Al Bridwell (Portrait With & Without Cap)
Lou Fiene (Portrait & Throwing)
Dick Hoblitzell
Otto Knabe
Paddy Livingston
Nap Rucker
Boy, you are really busting this guys balls on this thing about chief bender. What if he does produce a coa? I hope you like your crow well done.
